00151 inline Region Region::operator+ (const Region& region) const
00152 {
00153     Region temp;
00154 
00155     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = this->coordinates_.begin(); i != coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00156         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00157 
00158     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = region.coordinates_.begin(); i != region.coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00159         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00160 
00161     return temp;
00162 };

00165 inline bool Region::operator< (const Region& region) const
00166 {
00167     if ( this->bottomBorderRow() < region.topBorderRow() )
00168         return true;
00169     else
00170     {
00171         if ( region.bottomBorderRow() < this->topBorderRow() )
00172             return false;
00173         else
00174             return ( this->topLeftmostPixelCoordinates().second < region.topLeftmostPixelCoordinates().second );
00175     }
00176 };
